field.label: Domain
field.help: Do not use 'local' as your internal domain name. It is reserved for and will interfere with mDNS (avahi, bonjour, etc.). Instead, use the special-use domain internal or home.arpa, also to avoid DNSSEC validation issues. E.g. internal, name.internal.

field.label: DNS Servers
field.help: Set primary domain name server IPv4 or IPv6 address. Repeat this option to set secondary DNS server addresses.

field.label: Override DNS
field.help: Allow DNS servers to be overridden by DHCP/PPP on WAN

field.label: Harden DNSSEC data
field.help: DNSSEC data is required for trust-anchored zones. If such data is absent, the zone becomes bogus. If this is disabled and no DNSSEC data is received, then the zone is made insecure.
